version_description:
- Newly updated icon
- Adjustable difficulty level
- Major bug fixes for seamless play and performance enhancements

- New and improved settings page
- New stats page to keep track of your best games and improvement over time
- Updated user interface to make gameplay smoother

Weâ€™ve been listening!

- Landscape mode is back!
- New, larger flag button with increased sensitivity to speed up gameplay
- Lose game popup is gone
- Larger text on settings and stats pages

- We've improved flag mode to make it easier to know when flag mode is enabled.
- Updated and more accurate stats page to keep track of your best times!
- This update also includes small graphics tweaks and small bug fixes.
General fixes and improvements!  Thanks for playing!  Keep on sweeping!
Bug fixes and general improvements  Keep on sweeping! :)
General fixes and improvements!  Thanks for playing!  Keep on sweeping!

Small but significant improvements for a better all-around experience. :)

Thanks for playing. Need help? Want to provide feedback? Get in touch with us at contact@maplemedia.io.

Small but significant improvements for a better all-around experience. :)

Thanks for playing. Need help? Want to provide feedback? Get in touch with us at contact@maplemedia.io.

Thanks for updating Minesweeper Classic 2! Big thanks to our users and their continued support!
Here's what's in this update:

- Improved support for iPhone X, XS, iPhone 11 devices, and iOS 14 compatibility.

- Upgraded in-game play with distinguished flags active & inactive states.

- More user-friendly difficulty settings screen, complete with fun emojis & bolder custom game section.

- Better instructions first time users new to Minesweeper Classic.

- Plus, many significant app optimizations, stability fixes, & general improvements.

Thanks for downloading our latest update of Minesweeper Classic 2!

Questions? Feedback?
Reach out to us at contact@maplemedia.io for fast and friendly help from our team.
